channel.title: Humor on VirtualSheep
channel.description: Recent content in Humor on VirtualSheep

item.title: The One Job AI Can't Replace: The Human Art of Toilet Paper Evaluation
item.description: Why AI may write poetry, but it’ll never judge ply strength. A satirical but serious call for transparent toilet paper metrics.

item.title: The Curious Case of ChatGTP
item.description: Did I really call it ChatGTP for over a year? What started as a typo turned into a weird ride through memory glitches, multiverse musings, and the moment I finally realized… I’d been wrong all along.

item.title: HTMLython™: The Whitespace-Driven Future of the Web Nobody Asked For
item.description: Imagine if HTML ran away with Python in a whirlwind romance and created a markup language that was as sensitive as your developer friend’s Vim config.
